title: Why i can't make a PBE Account??
body:
Does Anybody Know Why i cant make A PBE Account? The Page i visited to sign-up for PBE Shows a I-blitzcrank skin saying Error: 500 ·
Something’s gone hextechnically wrong.

Maintenance golems are working to exterminate the problem.

If Someone can atleast help i would be glad to give a reward or something

replies.body: The PBE page is currently down for maintenance, so it's not possible to sign up or make an account.  Bookmark the[ PBE status page](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) as we'll continue to provide updates there.  Hang tight!
